pullrequest.title: Allow world with a name other than "default". Fixed all tests.

content.raw: I was unable to repeat the failures in my local machine but _stress appear to fail from time to time in Amazon and Nvidia testing boxes in the form of [segfault](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-vrc/18/console) or [timeout](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-quantal-amd64-gpu-nvidia/8/testReport/junit/%28root%29/transport_stress/test_ran/). Probably it will need manual inspection in the affected machines.
content.html: I was unable to repeat the failures in my local machine but _stress appear to fail from time to time in Amazon and Nvidia testing boxes in the form of segfault or timeout. Probably it will need manual inspection in the affected machines.
